snippet.title: Ultimate Rivals: The Rink — Apple Arcade
snippet.description: Fifty-eight pro athletes. From five sports. All on one rink. It’s anyone’s game. Play as your favorite athlete in Ultimate Rivals: The Rink on Apple Arcade. Find it on the App Store: https://apple.co/2RIzyO4 Learn more about Apple Arcade: http://apple.co/AppleArcade Game featured: Ultimate Rivals: The Rink by Bit Fry Game Studios, Inc. Music featured: “Like Lightning” by Foals: https://apple.co/-likelightning Subscribe to Apple’s YouTube channel: https://apple.co/2kT1K2B Follow Apple Arcade on Twitter: http://twitter.com/AppleArcade
